statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Long long ago, there is an ant crawling on an L-meter magic rubber band with speed of v cm/s.The magic rubber band will elongate m meters every second. We can assume that the magic rubber band elongates equably. Now, the ant is on the start point and crawling to another point, please tell me whether it can reach the endpoint.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line of the input is T, which stands for the number of test cases you need to solve.
Each case include three integers: L , v , m ( 0< L< 10^9,0<= v, m< 10^ 9,).

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, if the ant can reach endpoint, output "YES", otherwise "NO".
